name: Merclops
description: The Merclops is a Huge Giant known for its immense strength, with a strong physique and a club weapon. Its presence is imposing, particularly in aquatic environments.
memorable: It attacks with advantage when frightened, but struggles with ranged attacks due to poor depth perception.
goals: To dominate in combat, particularly in close quarters and underwater settings.
relations: Related to other aquatic giants, potentially serving under them or operating in the same regions.
environment: Aquatic environments, such as deep waters or coastal areas.
strengths: High physical strength and hit points, advantages in close quarters and underwater.
weaknesses: Disadvantage on ranged attacks due to poor depth perception.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee attacks with a club and harpoon, capable of pulling foes closer.
most_powerful_ability: Panicked Rage, allowing advantage on attack rolls when frightened.
equipment: Club and harpoon, used for melee and ranged combat.
skills: Proficient in Survival, suggesting a good ability to navigate aquatic environments.
additional_information: Allows for tactical flexibility with the Thick Skulled ability to end conditions.
Can make two melee attacks with the Multiattack action.
Its harpoon attack can pull opponents closer, adding tactical advantage.
Very high Strength and Constitution, making it durable in combat.
Can breathe underwater, making it a dangerous opponent in aquatic scenarios.

giant that is strong but struggles ranged
giant that can attack with advantage when frightened
